mapper.select: SELECT member_uid "uid", email "email", password "pw", nickname "nickname", phoneNumber "phoneNumber", authority "authority" FROM mc_member ORDER BY member_uid DESC
SELECT member_uid "uid", email "email", password "pw", nickname "nickname", phoneNumber "phoneNumber", authority "authority" FROM mc_member WHERE meber_uid = #{uid}
SELECT member_uid "uid", email "email", password "pw", nickname "nickname", phoneNumber "phoneNumber", authority "authority" FROM mc_member WHERE email = #{email}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mc_member (email, password, nickname, phoneNumber, authority) VALUES (#{email} , #{pw} , #{nickname} , #{phoneNumber}, #{authority} )
